mapper.sql: student_id, card_id, fingerprint_id, avatar_id, responsible, telephone, is_delete, create_by, create_at
mapper.select:
SELECT t_student_info.student_id,avatar_img,fingerprint_img,card_name,gender,t_student.telephone,email,nation,birthday,education,insured_state FROM t_student_info LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student_info.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_idcard ON t_student_info.card_id = t_idcard.card_id LEFT JOIN t_avatar ON t_student_info.avatar_id = t_avatar.avatar_id LEFT JOIN t_fingerprint ON t_student_info.fingerprint_id = t_fingerprint.fingerprint_id WHERE t_student_info.is_delete = 0
limit #{length} offset #{start}
select count(*) from t_class where is_delete = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_student_info
student_id,
card_id,
fingerprint_id,
avatar_id,
responsible,
telephone,
is_delete,
create_by,
create_at,
